H0.text: Water for plants is one role of a producer in a food chain.

H1.text: Sunlight for plants is one role of a producer in a food chain.

H2.text: Nutrients for animals are provided by a producer in a food chain.

H3.text: Shelter for animals is one role of a producer in a food chain.

A4.text: Primary producers, or autotrophs, utilize energy derived from either sunlight or inorganic chemical compounds to create complex organic compounds, such as starch, for energy.
